description: Israeli strikes on Nasser Hospital in Gaza killed at least 20 people, including five journalists, and wounded scores more. The initial strike hit an upper floor, followed by a second strike on a stairwell as journalists and rescue workers arrived.

title: Twelve soldiers killed in Pakistani Taliban attack: officials
description: At least 12 soldiers were killed in an ambush by the Pakistani Taliban in northwest Pakistan on Saturday, local government and security officials told AFP. 00 am when "armed men opened fire from both sides with heavy weapons", killing 12 security personnel, a…

title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk killing charged with aggravated murder and weapon and obstruction offenses
description: Tyler Robinson was charged with aggravated murder for the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University. Robinson potentially faces the death penalty if convicted. He is also charged with felony discharge of a firearm and obstr…

title: 25 killed, over 600 injured in 'Gen-Z' agitation in Nepal
description: Violent anti-government protests led by the 'Gen Z' group in Nepal have resulted in at least 25 deaths, including three policemen. Security forces opened fire on protesters near the Parliament building, causing numerous casualties. In response to the escalati…

title: Hamas says five of its members were killed in Israeli attack on Doha
description: Hamas reported that five of its members, including the son of Khalil al-Hayya, Hamas's Gaza chief, were killed in an Israeli attack in Doha. The group claimed that Israel's attempt to assassinate its ceasefire negotiation team had failed. A Hamas political bu…

title: Charlie Kirk Shooter and Murder Weapon Identified? FBI leads manhunt but will not release picture but why. Footwear impression, palm print, forearm imprints found
description: Charlie Kirk shooter and murder weapon identified by the FBI after the conservative activist was fatally shot at Utah Valley University. Officials recovered a bolt-action rifle, tracked suspect movements, and continue a nationwide manhunt.

title: 'When we take PoK back, our objective will be achieved...': Uma Bharti lauds Operation Sindoor
description: India launched Operation Sindoor on May 7 as a military response to the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack in which 26 people were killed. The Indian Armed Forces targeted terror infrastructure in Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir, leading to the eliminatio…

title: New York-based doctor shares ways to clear the sticky layer of fat and cholesterol in arteries, a major cause of heart attack
description: Dr. Vassily Eliopoulos suggests that plaque buildup in arteries isn't always permanent and can potentially be reversed by addressing the root cause. He recommends advanced testing, a Mediterranean-style diet, regular exercise, sufficient sleep, and therapeuti…

title: Luigi Mangione secures big win in UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson shooting case: Here's what the judge said
description: Luigi Mangione, accused of fatally shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, saw terrorism charges dismissed by a New York judge. Judge Gregory Carro allowed a second-degree murder charge to stand, setting the stage for a December 2024 trial. Despite faci…
